thread.title: Really friendly staff and great location
thread.title_full: Really friendly staff and great location - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kamcalli1
title: Really friendly staff and great location
text: You can't beat a Hilton property for value and service. We stayed here on a Saturday. The staff was consistently friendly and helpful. Our rooms were roomie (which can't be said in every NYC hotel) with a king sized bed. The bathroom was spacious as well. It was in a great central location. We had the breakfast in the morning, which was a little more amped up from a typical Hilton Garden, but still fine for the convenience of just going downstairs to eat. We parked in the associated ICON 24 garage and it only cost us $47 for 24 hours of parking - which again is a bargain. I'd definitely stay here again!
